de.mrapp.android.dialog.decorator

Class WizardDialogDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.dialog.decorator.AbstractDialogFragmentDecorator<HeaderDialog>
      • de.mrapp.android.dialog.decorator.WizardDialogDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.support.v4.view.ViewPager.OnPageChangeListener, Dialog, WizardDialogDecorator

    public class WizardDialogDecorator
extends AbstractDialogFragmentDecorator<HeaderDialog>
implements WizardDialogDecorator, android.support.v4.view.ViewPager.OnPageChangeListener
    A decorator, which allows to modify the view hierarchy of a dialog, which is designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices and provides a navigation for switching between multiple fragments.
    Since:
    3.2.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WizardDialogDecorator(HeaderDialog dialog)
      Creates a new decorator, which allows to modify the view hierarchy of a dialog, which is designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices and provides a navigation for switching between multiple fragments..

      • WizardDialogDecorator

        public WizardDialogDecorator(@NonNull
                             HeaderDialog dialog)
        Creates a new decorator, which allows to modify the view hierarchy of a dialog, which is designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices and provides a navigation for switching between multiple fragments..
        Parameters:
        dialog - The dialog, whose view hierarchy should be modified by the decorator, as an instance of the generic type DialogType. The dialog may not be null

        public final void enableTabLayout(boolean enable)
